meta.name: description
meta.content: Miami ISD is the only school district located in Roberts County, Texas. The school is located in Miami, TX, a rural community in the Texas Panhandle. Miami offers students a variety of opportunity such as dual credit college courses, Career Tech programs, Athletics, Band and more. We have a small school atmosphere with large school opportunities. Thank you visiting our site.

div.h4: Miami ISD will provide a foundation for the responsibilities students will assume as adults in family, church, community, state, and national affairs. As a result, students will work diligently on acquiring attitudes and principles that will prepare them to become worthwhile and contributing citizens of our free society.

div.h4: ONLINE PAYMENT SYSTEM AVAILABLE FOR STUDENT MEALS Posted Date: 10/02/2019
div.p:
Dear Parents,
Great News! Dealing with your children’s lunch money and school fee payments just got a lot easier. You can now add money to your child’s meal account, see their cafeteria purchase . . .

div.h4: Important Drop Off and Parking Info Posted Date: 08/08/2019

div.p: Sign Up for MISD Notifications and Alerts

Follow the link below to access the TxConnect parent portal. If you have not registered for the TxConnect system please download the pdf instructions and follow them. If you are unable to access the system or have any issues or questions about registering please contact Tara Royal at 806-868-3971.
Miami ISD has a staff and student body determined to exhibit excellence in every endeavor and demonstrate integrity in every encounter to be an inspiration to the community and the world.
Sign Up for MISD Notifications and Alerts

Miami ISD has a staff and student body determined to exhibit excellence in every endeavor and demonstrate integrity in every encounter to be an inspiration to the community and the world.

div.class: custom_105156 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomInUp
div.p: Miami ISD is the only school district located in Roberts County, Texas. The school is located in Miami, TX, a rural community in the Texas Panhandle. Miami offers its students a variety of opportunity such as dual credit college courses, Career Tech Programs, Athletics, Band and more. We pride ourselves by supplying our students with a small school atmosphere and large school opportunities. Thank you visiting our site.
